title: CLIL-FPI Integrated Problem-Centered Japanese Language Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course designed for science researchers to read Japanese academic papers and engage in scholarly communication. Includes situational language application training using VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze Japanese scientific texts with 70% or higher accuracy.
Learners can complete academic writing structures by utilizing the problem-centered approach of FPI.
Learners can explain scientific experiment procedures in Japanese with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can perform collaboration scenarios with Japanese researchers by applying intercultural communication strategies.

resources: Japanese Content Database for Science Subjects
Smartphone Voice Memo App for Group Discussion Recording
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
